span.p:
Limited capacity
Conversation history
Persists across LLM calls

div.style: color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
color: rgb(44, 62, 80) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Specific events & experiences
Agent actions & outcomes
Example: Last birthday party

div.style: color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
color: rgb(44, 62, 80) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Knowledge about the world
External databases (Wikipedia)
Example: Capital of France

span.p:
Patterns & procedures
System prompts
Example: How to write Python
